Contact.heading: Contact.
Contact.text1: If you have any privacy-related questions, feel free to send an email to privacy[at]pprmint.art.
Contact.text2: Only use this address for the above-mentioned purpose, not to ask general questions, send advertisements, spam or similar.
Contact.text3: Emails you might send to me will be processed by my mail provider Fastmail. I'll never share your name, email address or the message contents with anyone.

General.heading: General.
General.text1: This website does not directly collect any personal information, be it through analytics, ads, trackers, cookies, fingerprinting, what have you.
General.text2: Pages may contain links to third party websites. Their contents, privacy policies and other practices are nothing I have control over and nothing I take any responsibility for.

Log.accessTime: <0>Access time: </0>The time when a client (so your browser) received a file from the server. If you care: The format is DD/MMMM/YYYY: HH:MM:SS +GMT.
Log.httpCode: <0>HTTP response code: </0>That's usually "200 OK" because ♪ everything is awesome ♪. If you wanna learn more about all the different codes of the HTTP world:
Log.ipAddress: <0>IP address: </0>The thing that identifies yourself on the interwebs. Hetzner anonymizes IP addresses by randomizing their last octet with a random number.
Log.userAgent: <0>User-Agent: </0>This thing tells the server infos like what browser, operating system and rendering engine was used to access something. It also allows me to tell you that Windows 11 is still referred to as "Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64" in there. For more info on what's in the User-Agent header, have a look here:

Hosting.heading: Hosting.
Hosting.text1: Different hosting providers are used to provide the website and its contents in order to be able to work with modern web technologies, and to provide media and downloads in original quality and without bandwidth limitations on the basis of Article 6 (1) point (f) GDPR.
Hosting.text2: To deploy the website itself, I use Vercel, a cloud deployment platform provided by Vercel Inc. (340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA).
Hosting.text3: Media such as images and videos, as well as files offered as downloads are stored on servers of the Hetzner Online GmbH (Industriestrasse 25, 91710 Gunzenhausen, Germany).
Hosting.text4: This website doesn’t collect any personal information, nor does it use analytics tools. However, information is collected by the hosting providers automatically upon your visit and stored in server log files. These logs can contain the following information:
Hosting.text5: Log entries are stored by Hetzner for 7 days. Vercel retains data for as long as it is necessary to provide its services. Data is deleted periodically when possible. If deletion is not possible, data is stored securely and in isolation until deletion is possible.
Hosting.text6: For more information, please see Hetzner's and Vercel's privacy statements, as well as Vercel's Data Processing Addendum.

Tldr.heading: TL;DR:
Tldr.text: Server logs are the only things that store information about you, or rather about the browser and device you're currently using. The actual site is hosted by Vercel, with some images, videos and downloads coming from my webspace on Hetzner.

Head.description: Learn about what data is processed upon your visit.
Head.title: Privacy policy
